author: Anonymous Poet
title: SPD Handin-connect issues
question:
I was working on my Pset for this week and the SPD Handin was working just fine and suddenly it wasn't. I keep getting the following error which I'm not sure how to solve:
"handin-connect: could not connect to the server (cs110.students.cs.ubc.ca:7979)" followed by a "Connection Failed"
I've already tried the following solutions:
- restarting my laptop
- opening and closing the file
- installing and reinstalling racket
- turning my wifi on and off
- updating SPD plugin (says it is up to date) 
- reinstalling the .plt file
I would greatly appreciate it if someone could point me in the correct direction of how to fix this issue. Thank you in advance :)
student_answer: Happening to me too right now—it might have to do with the server itself
